pr_title: Simplify Java programming exercise templates based on new artemis-java-test-sandbox version

timeline.message: simplify Java programming exercise templates based on new artemis-java-test-sandbox version
Remove copying of testUtils as they moved to Ares
Remove Todos from kotlin template solution
adjust test.json and fix security issue with kotlin libraries
Add temporary snapshot repositories for testing purposes
